page.title: 11A day in my life. (Child)
page.content: Most of my life I spend thinking about my friends and doing my maths and my writing.Most days I come to school and most nughts I play in the trees at the end of the road with Hannah,Sam and Ben.Each morning I always want to get up and at night I never want to go to bed.For breakfast I have Alpen.When I get home from school I have a drink and a biscuit.At school I love doing maths and copying out things.In the playground I like playing hopscotch and marbles with my friends.I play with my friends climbing trees and down the dyke.My favourite food is steak and chips.I sometimes watch TV and I sometimes read.I go running with my brother.My life is not boring.I go to the gym on Saturday mornings and my Grandme comes in the afternnoon.
